name: Tenable
description: This plugin is used to fetch Assets from the Vulnerability Management > Explore > Assets page of the Tenable platform. This plugin supports 'Tag/Untag Asset' actions on Assets.

configuration.label: Access Key
configuration.description: Access Key generated from the Tenable platform. It can be generated from the 'Profile > My Profile > API Keys > Generate' page.

configuration.label: Secret Key
configuration.description: Secret Key generated from the Tenable platform. It can be generated from the 'Profile > My Profile > API Keys > Generate' page.

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the Vulnerability Finding data for the initial run. Value must be from 0 to 2^62.

configuration.label: Number of Retries
configuration.description: Number of retries of 60 seconds for the Export status check. Value must be from 0 to 2^62.
